ygData.subject: RE: RE: Simply Charming...
ygData.msgSnippet: Unfortunately, I don t know. A rare spawn in the Rathe Mountains, I think. I was given mine by a higher level bard.
ygData.messageBody:
Unfortunately, I don't know. A rare spawn in the Rathe Mountains, I think. I
was given mine by a higher level bard.

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Jeff Illian [mailto:jeff@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 10:40 AM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Simply Charming...
>
>
>From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>
>
>What's drops the Siryn Hood? I currently use a leatherfoot skullcap (+10
>Cha, AC4). I fooled around with a blackened iron crown, but I found my
>lullaby, lament, charm, etc, all to be more effective with a high charisma.
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]
>> Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 12:30 PM
>> To: eqbards@onelist.com
>> Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Simply Charming...
>>
>>
>> From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
>>
>> Yes. I knew others could use it not equipped (I've got a bard
>> friend who had
>> one. She used it non-equipped as well though...) But I thought it
>> was head.
>> Yes, 13 charisma is better than the veil.
>>
>> You might also, then, want to try to get a Siryn Hood -- head piece. +13
>> charisma
>>
>> >-----Original Message-----
>> >From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
>> >Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 10:10 AM
>> >To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
>> >Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Simply Charming...
>> >
>> >
>> >From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>> >
>> >Hehe, well it is kinda a hot topic since the patch - but...
>> >
>> >The old guise is a face piece (bard/rogue to equip it and get
>> stat boosts)
>> >but old owners if not bard/rog could have it in a main inv slot
>and right
>> >click it for its effect: Illusion - Dark Elf
>> >
>> >Guise of the Deceiver: AC 4, +13 char, +7 magic protection. Wt
>> 0.4. Effect
>> >of illusion dark elf (can be used by all classes). Wearable
>> Classes: B, Ro.
>> >Found on Ghoul Assassin in Lower Guk. [No Longer Drops - now
>> drops mask of
>> >deception] (Submitted by Grollem)
>> >
>> >Mask of Deception: <graphics9/Mask_of_Deception.html> AC 4,
>+13 char, +7
>> >magic protection. Wt 0.4. Effect of illusion dark elf (must be worn for
>> >effect). Magic, lore, no drop. Classes: B, Ro. Found on Ghoul
>Assassin in
>> >Lower Guk. (Submitted by Naan Aokiri)
>> >
>> >
>> >Sylly
>> >
>> > -----Original Message-----
>> > From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]
>> > Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 11:54 AM

>> > slow)
>> >
>> > >-----Original Message-----
>> > >From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
